A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From the first 5 minutes of the film to the final scenes\, I cringed every moment. Characters have no development\, the story has no direction whatsoever\, and the poorly placed comedic relief just made things worse. As a big fan of the Star Wars films (including The Force Awakens)\, this was a thoroughly dissatisfying film. I can't fathom how critics found this movie enjoyable. The difference in the audience score and the tomatometer is staggering\, and speaks for itself.
